titles.title: Prevention of Mental Health Discrimination During Military Accession Act
Prevention of Mental Health Discrimination During Military Accession Act
A bill to enhance the prevention of mental health discrimination against individuals during accession into the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Prevention of Mental Health Discrimination During Military Accession Act
This bill addresses discrimination in appointment, enlistment, or induction in the Armed Forces on account of an Armed Forces candidate having a mental health condition.
